alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Fulton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 1:53PM EDT until June 16 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Franklin County in south central Pennsylvania... South central Fulton County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 152 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Big Cove Tannery, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mercersburg, Claylick and Whitetail Ski Area. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
